pkgmetadata.longdescription: Store and Manage Arbitrarily Large Integers // Multi-precission library that allows to store and manage arbitrarily big integers without loss of precision. It includes a large list of tools to work with them, like: - Arithmetic and logic operators - Modular-arithmetic operators - Computer Number Theory utilities - Probabilistic primality tests - Factorization algorithms - Random generators of diferent types of integers.
